about_the_game:
This new version of "Absolute Doppelkopf for Windows 11" contains an extended set of rules with an extensive compilation of different variants and settings.

The elaborately revised, self-learning AI is now even more adapted to the wishes of our Doppelkopf players. The program contains among other things numerous variants of the game rules to different topics like: Mixing in, pigs and super pigs, duels, game types, special points, announcements and cancellations, evaluation, Karlchen, in addition, sounded announcements of the players as well as many card sets. Enjoy a challenging game of Doppelkopf!

Features:

- Tournament-compliant game rules (the rules for duels, special points, announcements and cancellations,
game types correspond to the official tournament rules and can be changed at will)
- Intelligent enemies with new improved AI
- Extensive game evaluation and points table
- Last stitch visible
- Possibility to repeat games and whole games with the same cards; different sets of cards (French and German hands)
- Different map views (fanned/straight, large/small)
- Game and animation speed selectable
- Individual memory function
- Cards can be freely sorted on the hand, or automatically sorted
- Comprehensive instructions and tutorials, therefore also suitable for beginners

name: Absolute Doppelkopf for Windows 11

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP / 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo 2 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard graphic card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP / 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo 2 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4800 Series
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard Soundcard

short_description: This new version of "Absolute Doppelkopf for Windows 11" contains an extended set of rules with an extensive compilation of different variants and settings.
